test-case.name: same-key-001
test-case.description: op:same-key over xs:string, xs:anyURI, and xs:untypedAtomic
test-case.test: map:merge(( map:entry(xs:untypedAtomic("abc"), 1), map:entry(xs:string("abc"), 1), map:entry(xs:anyURI("abc"), 1), map:entry(xs:string("xyz"), 1), map:entry(xs:untypedAtomic("xyz"), 1), map:entry(QName((),"abc"), 1) ), map{"duplicates":"use-last"})

test-case.name: same-key-002
test-case.description: op:same-key should not use the default collation

test-case.name: same-key-003
test-case.description: op:same-key over xs:string, xs:anyURI, and xs:untypedAtomic

test-case.name: same-key-004
test-case.test: map:merge(( map:entry(xs:double('NaN'), 1), map:entry(xs:double('INF'), 2), map:entry(xs:double('-INF'), 3), map:entry(xs:float('NaN'), 1), map:entry(xs:float('INF'), 2), map:entry(xs:float('-INF'), 3) ), map{"duplicates":"use-last"})

test-case.name: same-key-005
test-case.test: map:merge(( map:entry(xs:double('NaN'), 1), map:entry(xs:double('INF'), 2), map:entry(xs:double('-INF'), 3), map:entry(xs:float('NaN'), 1), map:entry(xs:float('INF'), 2), map:entry(xs:float('-INF'), 3) ), map{"duplicates":"use-last"})

test-case.name: same-key-006
same-key-007
same-key-008

all-of.assert: $result?((1 div 3 cast as xs:float) cast as xs:decimal) eq "float"
$result?((1 div 3 cast as xs:double) cast as xs:decimal) eq "double"
$result?((1 div 3 cast as xs:integer) cast as xs:decimal) eq "integer"

test-case.name: same-key-009
test-case.test: map { xs:integer("16777218") : 1 }

test-case.description: op:same-key over xs:boolean, xs:hexBinary, xs:base64Binary, xs:duration, and xs:QName

test-case.name: same-key-022

modified.change: Edit test to use XPath let expression syntax

test-case.test: let $ns := "http://example.org", $keys := (QName($ns, "foo"), QName($ns, "ns:foo"), QName($ns, "ns2:foo")) return map:merge($keys ! map:entry(., position()), map{"duplicates":"use-last"})

test-case.name: same-key-023
same-key-024
same-key-025
same-key-026

modified.change: Bug fix relating to issue 29659 - Added error codes as alternative results

any-of.assert-string-value: Size: 7, 1 $m(integer) == double, 2 $m(double) == double, 3 $m(integer) == integer, 4 $m(integer) == double, 5 $m(double) == double, 6 $m(integer) == integer, 7 $m(integer) == float, 8 $m(double) == float, 9 $m(float) == float, 10 $m(integer) == integer, 11 $m(integer) == double, 12 $m(double) == double

test-case.name: same-key-027
test-case.description: op:same-key values, times equal but in different timezones

test-case.name: same-key-028
test-case.description: A larger map containing duplicate values, times equal but in different timezones. See Saxon bug 3820. This error was masked in same-key-027 because the map was too small for hash codes to be used.
